title: Distorted Sound
body: Occasionally the sound in the launcher will get distorted and sounds really slow. Happens on champ select, lobby, etc. Sound is normal in game. Only way to fix it is to close client and re-launch. Is there a known fix for this?

replies.body: I just got a distorted sound to, only in my League client (ingame aswell).. Using a macbook air and regular iPhone airplugs.. Never had a issue with this before, butI just got it when i first opened the client today... Sucks...
Same issue here. Only on client (not in-game or other apps) and only sometimes. Audio and animations stutter a lot. Win7, focusrite usb audio interface.
Bump, been happening to me ever since I started playing again last month. Last time I played was back in September and audio worked fine then

This has been going on for months, anytime I use a headset when playing the game. I notice after 3-4 matches the client starts to distort sound and gets progressively worse each game, to the point where it also starts to bug out the client and feels like fps drop significantly in champ select. Thankfully it's an easy fix by just restarting client when I first start to notice it happening, but frustrating nonetheless. Also, literally nothing else has this issue when it happens, only league client.

Windows 10
AMD FX(tm)-6120 six-core processor 3.50 GHz

(not sure what other info could be helpful, if there is something specific let me know and I can find it and add it to this)

Do you have any background applications running that interact with your audio device? You may want to disable any programs that could be doing this, as it will prevent any potential conflicts with the League Client. If you're not sure how to do this, let me know what Operating System your computer is running so I can give you the right directions.

Let me know if this helped!

I have the same problem.  The client and sound start out fine, but after several games the sound starts going crazy and the animation stutters with it.  It is only in the launcher, and only after many games or a long time of being on.  For me it only happens after a whole day playing the game repeatedly.  Leaving it on overnight seems to induce the problem as well.  Everything else on the computer runs fine when this happens: i can watch videos, browse the web, whatever.  It's only LOL that stutters.

I have the exact same problem.
Distorted audio in champ select. Never happens right after opening the client I have to play a few games before it starts. Restarting the client always helps. The only software I'm running in the background are a few browsers and drivers are updated too. Seems there are more people with this issue. I remember reading another post about this a few weeks ago.
Is this happening with a specific audio device, or have you tested this with multiple audio devices? I'd be interested to see if this is isolated or not.
I have exactly the same issue. I cant find a way to reproduce this though. When i start the client for the first time it works ok. After a few games, sfx everywhere in the client gets distorted
